description: Map drawn from the document entitled Winds and other direction navigation tools among the Bagungu of the Albertine region of Uganda (Lugungu) Mpehu hamwei̱ na byab̯uhangwa bindi bi̱koonyera Bagungu beicala mu Matwale Geitaka lya Mwi̱tanzi̱ge kubaragiira b̯u̱ki̱i̱zi̱ rundi muhanda gwa kukwata rundi gwa kutoma, compiled by Bugungu Heritage and Information Centre (2022)
